pages.title: Preface
pages.text: Before doing anything else, run the command $(comm)/island create$() to begin playing in earnest. If looking to play co-op with others, instead refer to $(l:collected_knowledge/coop)"Multiplayer: How to Co-op"$().$(br2)This quest book is structured such that not all entries are completable "quests". All entries when first unlocked will have a red mark

indicating they are unread. However, after reading them, $(thing)quests$() will have an orange marker indicating they are incomplete, changing to green once complete.$(br2)$(thing)Quests$() are explicitly for tracking the core progression, while other items/information are contained in other chapters, and neither track completion nor give rewards.$(br2)$(thing)Quest$() rewards are granted instantly, directly into your inventory.
